𓈋 Tal dual
𓏏 tell talk (exaggerate) tall طويل (b)tawil tower ط
𓈏 𓏏 𓏤 𓈇 ruin mound
𓊕 town 𓈇 tawi ظوحي tawahi (suburb)
𜏂 𜏏 𜏨 𜏧 Teil tell town vs 𜏇 ho half 𔓷 ha

𒆠 #tuli tell ≈ 𒌋𒍵 𒌋𒌆 𒌋𒉇 tu.vl 𒌋𒂠 𒌋𒍥 𒆠 #tuli tell ≈ 𒆢 𒆣 𒅇 𒇭

𒋾𒇻 ti-lu tell (ruin) mound

𓏘 𓏘 𓏘 𓇤 | heap | 𒋫𒉘𒈬 ta-ram-mu taramu 𓇾 terra ϩⲟⲣϫ⳼ ⲑⲁⲗ > tell
